title: Maintaining household independence and self-sufficiency
content:
Scenario: Maintaining household independence and self-sufficiency
    Given Frank and his wife value their independence
    And they want to age in place as long as possible
    When the household_elohim supports independence
    Then it should help household maintain self-sufficiency
    And it should optimize resources for maximum autonomy
    And it should coordinate with family without creating dependence
    And it should surface when external support is truly needed
    And household should experience agency and dignity in aging
    And independence should be supported as long as safe and sustainable
